def convert(x,y):
    ans=0
    j=x
    for i in range(0,x+1):
        ans=ans+y*pow(10,j)
        j=j-1
    
    return ans

def changetoarray(i):
    arr=[]
    while(i>0):
        temp=i%10
        i=i/10
        arr.append(temp)
    arr=arr[::-1]
    return arr
            
    
        

def main():
    t=input()
    while(t):
        s=[]
       
        a=raw_input().split()
        for i in range(0,10):
            temp=int(a[i])
            s.append(temp)
        
        a=list(s)
        flag=0
        i=1
        while(flag==0 and i<10):
            if(s[i]==0):
                ans=i
                flag=1
            i=i+1
       
        if(flag==0):
            y=9999999999999999999
            for x in range(1,10):
                
                z=convert(s[x],x)
                if(z<y):
                    y=z
     
        
            i=10
            flag1=0
            
            while(flag1==0):
                
                s=list(a)
                arr=changetoarray(i)
               
           
                for j in range(0,arr.__len__()):
                    if(s[arr[j]]==0):
                        flag1=1
                        break
                    else:
                        s[arr[j]]=s[arr[j]]-1
                i=i*10
            
            i=i/10
        if(flag==1):
            print ans
        else:
            ans=min(i,y)
            print ans
        
        t=t-1
      
        
        
           

main()
